sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnbkmkmenumanageresult ( MENU_ID /* */ , EMPLYR_ID /* */ , MENU_NM /* */ , PROGRM_STRE_PATH /* */ ) VALUES ( #menuId# /* */ , #emplyrId# /* */ , #menuNm# /* */ , #progrmStrePath# /* */ )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnbkmkmenumanageresult SET MENU_ID=#menuId# /* */ , EMPLYR_ID=#emplyrId# /* */ , MENU_NM=#menuNm# /* */ , PROGRM_STRE_PATH=#progrmStrePath# /* */ WHERE MENU_ID=#menuId# /* */ AND EMPLYR_ID=#emplyrId# /* */
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtnbkmkmenumanageresult WHERE MENU_ID=#menuId# /* */ AND EMPLYR_ID=#emplyrId# /* */
sqlMap.select: SELECT MENU_ID /* */ , EMPLYR_ID /* */ , MENU_NM /* */ , PROGRM_STRE_PATH /* */ FROM comtnbkmkmenumanageresult WHERE MENU_ID=#menuId# /* */ AND EMPLYR_ID=#emplyrId# /* */

SELECT MENU_ID /* */ , EMPLYR_ID /* */ , MENU_NM /* */ , PROGRM_STRE_PATH /* */ FROM comtnbkmkmenumanageresult WHERE 1=1
MENU_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
EMPLYR_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
ORDER BY MENU_ID DESC /* */ , EMPLYR_ID DESC /* */ limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtnbkmkmenumanageresult WHERE 1=1
MENU_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
EMPLYR_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
